TopicTitle: I keep getting internal server error.

Articles.Content:
So I was just going onto the site and it gave me 'Internal Server Error' and when I refreshed I still kept getting it until right now...

Any solutions?

How long ago?

They just updated the site/rearranged things.

How long ago?

They just updated the site/rearranged things.

At the time it was about five minutes before this post.

Yeah, the server threw a fit on us a few moments ago... We got on the phone with our web host support, and it\'s back up now. (And hopefully it will stay like that). Looks like it was on their end.

Cheers

Yeah, the server threw a fit on us a few moments ago... We got on the phone with our web host support, and it\'s back up now. (And hopefully it will stay like that). Looks like it was on their end.

Cheers

Well that\'s good.

I thought it was my ISP...

Considering they 503 almost every site on the internet...

(The suns out too long now so the signals coming in to hot..)
